Plot: A Marine travels to North Carolina after serving three tours in Iraq and searches for the unknown woman he believes was his good luck charm during the war.
Title: The Lucky One
Actors: Zac Efron, Taylor Schilling, Blythe Danner, Riley Thomas Stewart
tomatoConsensus: While it provides the requisite amount of escapist melodrama, The Lucky One ultimately relies on too many schmaltzy clichés to appeal to anyone not already familiar with the Nicholas Sparks formula.
